sections.heading: ðŸ”¹ JavaScript in Modern Web Development
content: JavaScript is now a cornerstone of modern web development alongside HTML and CSS.
It powers frontend frameworks like React, Vue, and Angular, and backend development with Node.js.
The language evolves through yearly updates governed by TC39 (ECMAScript committee).
